Player History
Injured on 7/28/1965 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1967...
Released by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1967...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 3/2/1967 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/8/1968 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/28/1969 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/3/1971 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 4/1/1972 (Going to HOU: P J. Maloney, 3B T. Perez, 1B L. May. Going to CIN: P J. Denny, P F. Cambria, 1B H. Kato, P R. Corbin, RF T. Armas Sr.)...
Injured on 7/12/1973 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/1/1978 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 7/21/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $628,000 per year...
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1985...
Injured on 8/19/1989 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for entire career...
Injured on 4/11/1991 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/10/1995, off Britt Burns (CAL)...
